name: part_011
file: tmp_大神ミオ２周年記念３Dライブ【2nd anniversary】 [mmUVwNut2-Y]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio performs the song 'Yumemiru Sora e' (To the Dreaming Sky) as the grand finale of her 2nd anniversary live concert.
MC section where Mio thanks the audience and Fubuki joins her on stage to announce new 2nd anniversary merchandise.

subtitles.original: ...そっと描く 真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: ...softly drawing, straight ahead.

subtitles.original: 行くよ！ (行こう！)
subtitles.english: Here I go! (Let's go!)

subtitles.original: 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: To the dreaming sky!

subtitles.original: 笑い合ったことや つきそうにない話題
subtitles.english: The things we laughed about, and topics that didn't seem to fit.

subtitles.original: 思い出いっぱいなのに あっという間の日々
subtitles.english: Even though they're full of memories, the days passed in a flash.

subtitles.original: 上書きじゃなくて 名前付けて保存
subtitles.english: Not overwriting them, but saving them with a name.

subtitles.original: どれも全部大事って 言いきれる
subtitles.english: I can say for sure that every single one is important.

subtitles.original: One for All みんなのためが力になる
subtitles.english: One for All, being there for everyone becomes my strength.

subtitles.original: All for One 今日も賑やかすぎるくらい
subtitles.english: All for One, even today it's almost too lively.

subtitles.original: 笑顔が止まらない
subtitles.english: The smiles don't stop.

subtitles.original: 思いは膨らんでいく
subtitles.english: Our feelings keep on growing.

subtitles.original: 重ねた手はギュッと噛みしめた
subtitles.english: I squeezed our joined hands tight.

subtitles.original: 一人一人違う声で 歌声は広がる
subtitles.english: With each person's different voice, our singing spreads out.

subtitles.original: 風を感じたら 真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: Once you feel the breeze, go straight ahead.

subtitles.original: 行くよ！ (行こう！)
subtitles.english: Here I go! (Let's go!)

subtitles.original: 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: To the dreaming sky!

subtitles.original: 憧れて手を伸ばし
subtitles.english: Longing and reaching out,

subtitles.original: 掴み取った その光が
subtitles.english: that light I finally grasped...

subtitles.original: いつの日か また誰かの憧れに変わる
subtitles.english: Will one day become someone else's longing again.

subtitles.original: 繋げよう
subtitles.english: Let's connect them.

subtitles.original: みんな今日は一杯ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for today, everyone!

subtitles.original: ちょっと失敗しちゃったところもあったけど
subtitles.english: There were some parts where I messed up a bit, but...

subtitles.original: このステージ、凄い楽しかったよ！ありがとうね！
subtitles.english: this stage was so much fun! Thank you!

subtitles.original: 重ねた手はギュッと離さずに
subtitles.english: Without letting go of our joined hands...

subtitles.original: 一人一人違う色で 描き出すときめき
subtitles.english: Painting our excitement with each person's different color.

subtitles.original: 出会ったすべてにありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for everything I've encountered.

subtitles.original: 奇跡だって起こせるんだ ずっとずっと傍にいるよ
subtitles.english: We can even make miracles happen. I'll always be by your side.

subtitles.original: 行くよ！ (行こう！)
subtitles.english: Here I go! (Let's go!)

subtitles.original: 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: To the dreaming sky!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: というわけで
subtitles.english: And so...

subtitles.original: 以上、大神ミオ 2周年記念3Dライブでした！
subtitles.english: That was Ookami Mio's 2nd Anniversary 3D Live!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: フブキングも合いの手ありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Fubuki-ng, thank you for the backup calls too!

subtitles.original: よ、よ、よ、よ！
subtitles.english: Yo, yo, yo, yo!

subtitles.original: 助かったよー
subtitles.english: It really helped~

subtitles.original: いや、もう完全に心はミオファでしたね！
subtitles.english: No, my heart was completely that of a Mio-fa (Mio's fan)!

subtitles.original: もうフブキはね、デビュー当初から、この2年間ずっと一緒に歩いてきたから
subtitles.english: Fubuki and I have walked together for these past two years, ever since my debut.

subtitles.original: ね、ホントに！
subtitles.english: Right, truly!

subtitles.original: 1周年記念の時も、マイクが…1周年記念の時も、一緒に放送出てくれたり
subtitles.english: During the 1st anniversary, the mic... during the 1st anniversary too, you were on the broadcast with me.

subtitles.original: そう、2周年も絶対一緒に出てほしいなって思って！
subtitles.english: Yes, I really wanted you to be here for the 2nd anniversary too!

subtitles.original: いや、ありがと！
subtitles.english: No, thank you!

subtitles.original: フブキが来てくれて、ホントに嬉しかったです！
subtitles.english: I'm really glad Fubuki could come!

subtitles.original: 可愛いな、こちらこそだよ！
subtitles.english: How cute, same here!

subtitles.original: 大好きミオんだぞ！
subtitles.english: I love you, Mio-n!

subtitles.original: よしよししてくれる？
subtitles.english: Can you give me a "there, there"?

subtitles.original: あ、ホントにいいの？私、空気だけで…
subtitles.english: Oh, really? I'll just do the air...

subtitles.original: あ、よしよし、ミオ、よしよし。お疲れさん。
subtitles.english: ...there, there, Mio, there, there. Good job.

subtitles.original: テクニシャンなんだよな、ホント！
subtitles.english: She's really a technician, seriously!

subtitles.original: ミオのツボを心得てるんだよな
subtitles.english: She knows exactly how to get to Mio.

subtitles.original: というわけで
subtitles.english: And so...

subtitles.original: はい、ということでね、ライブは終わりなんですけど、ミオからの告知が、ある？
subtitles.english: Yes, so the live is over, but does Mio have an announcement?

subtitles.original: ザワザワ…皆さん、ちょっと前から言ってたんですけどね
subtitles.english: *Murmuring*... Everyone, I've been mentioning this for a little while now.

subtitles.original: あのですね、皆さん、なんと、2周年記念ボイス発売されます！
subtitles.english: Well, everyone, guess what? 2nd Anniversary voices will be on sale!

subtitles.original: 出たー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: It's here! Yay!

subtitles.original: え、ボイスだけなんですか？
subtitles.english: Eh, just voices?

subtitles.original: ちょっとあの…2周年記念ボイスに、特典というほど…でも凄く、特典というにはおこがましいのではないかというくらい、凄く沢山、あの、グッズを作っていただきまして
subtitles.english: Well... with the 2nd anniversary voices, there are bonuses... well, it might be presumptuous to even call them bonuses, but they've made a lot of goods for me.

subtitles.original: グッズセットなども、ご用意させていただいております！
subtitles.english: We also have goods sets and more prepared!

subtitles.original:
活動二周年記念 12/7(月)より販売
ボイス＆グッズ全部セット
subtitles.english:
2nd Anniversary Celebration - On sale from 12/7 (Mon)
Voice & Goods Complete Set

subtitles.original: なにー！あー！
subtitles.english: What! Ahhh!

subtitles.original: なんだこれはミオ！
subtitles.english: What is this, Mio?!

subtitles.original: これ、あの、ちょっと恥ずかしいんですけど
subtitles.english: This, um, it's a bit embarrassing, but...

subtitles.original: ミオ、ミオ、ミオ、はい、はい、はい
subtitles.english: Mio, Mio, Mio, yes, yes, yes.

subtitles.original: 結婚するのか、俺以外の奴と！
subtitles.english: Are you getting married?! To someone other than me?!

subtitles.original: バカタレ！なんだこの、嫁ミオ！
subtitles.english: You idiot! What is this, Bride Mio?!

subtitles.original: 許さんぞ白上！
subtitles.english: I won't forgive you, Shirakami!

subtitles.original: ちょっとあの、嫁ミオ…ですじゃないですけど
subtitles.english: It's, um, not exactly Bride Mio, but...
